author: kinman
msg: - Remove JspxState for now, since it is no longer used.  The code is just
commented out for now, we may need it later to pass value round other
- Make sure the "out" is set right at the right place.

author: remm
msg: - Take advantage of the fact that the PageContext is pooled.
- Modify the way the buffer reuse is done to conform with the PageContext
contract (basically, the code moves from the generated servlet to PageContext).

author: remm
msg: - Fix problems with JSTL. The timing of the clear of the BodyContent was
incorrect. Now, it is cleared when the buffer is reused.

author: remm
msg: - Code cleanup, based on ideas by Kin-Man. It still has a few issues with JSTL.

author: kinman
msg: - A out-of-line tag method should throw Throwable, since doCatch does.
